name: Low Road "Tails From The Gutter" EP - NEW RELEASE
description:
Welcome to Skeleton Crews newest release! LOW ROAD. Hailing from New Jersey. Low Road brings an all out assault on Hardcore as we know it. Out Now!

Formed back in 2010 by former members of  One 4 One, No Contest, Dirtnap, Tears of Frustration, December AE and Leathermouth. In 2011 the band suffered a devastating loss with the untimely passing of their lead singer Mario Comesanas. However Low Road shared that drive and strength that Mario lived his life by and did not let this slow them down. They regrouped and got their friend and former Path Of Aggression front man to join the band. 

"Tails From The Gutter". It is a seven track EP and features Marioâ€™s final work. 

1. Tails From The Gutter
2. The Never That Became
3. Pissed For Life (P.F.L.)
4. Left Behind
5. Unsuccessfully Coping With the Disappointment of Your Peers
6. Turning The Screw
7. Ember Mourning (R.I.P. Tribute)

name: The Architects - "The Hard Way" CD
description:
The Architects - "The Hard Way CD"
This is a beautiful 4 panel Digi Pack w/ 8 panel fold out lyric book.


On their fourth album, "The Hard Way," The Architects have hammered out another batch of songs steeped in bitter Kansas City tap water and fortified with stone cold badass. The lyrical core of "The Hard Way" is drawn from the deep pools of songsmiths like Johnny Cash, Waylon Jennings and Tom Petty, while the roaring, crashing sonic inspiration comes from the likes of The Clash, AC/DC, The Replacements and The Who. The Architects' fresh approach to "The Hard Way" has yielded anthemic songs like "Hell Came To Breakfast," an up-tempo epic which is due in no small part to the craftsman-like approach and to the return of platinum certified producer Aaron Conner (Bone Thugs N Harmony).


1. Year Of The Rat
2. Bastards at the Gate
3. Rope To Hang From
4. Knowing is Half the Bottle
5. I Carry A Gun
6. Hell Came to Breakfast
7. Big Iron Gate
8. Lost in the Dark
9. Death Rides a Horse
10. This Wasted Ocean

name: The Scandals - "The Sound Of Your Stereo" CD
description:
Punk rock is alive in New Jersey and The Scandals are proof positive of that. Since they formed in 2004, they have played an eclectic mix of venues, ranging from basements to bars, colleges, and major clubs, they have slowly but surely gained the crowd and the following most local bands strive for. After years of developing their sound and releasing a number of demos, they ironically matured with their previous EP Entitled To Youth.

The Scandals bring their energy from packed basement shows to your speakers with their first full length entitled The Sound Of Your Stereo. From start to finish, this album is a guaranteed roller coaster ride.

The Scandals recorded 14 tracks at the legendary Jersey City recording studio Big Blue Meenie, and mastered by Alan Douches of West West Side Music.

name: Hot Like (A) Robot CD/LP
description:
Hot Like (A) Robot
Virginity CD/LP

San Diego's Hot Like (A) Robot play smartly constructed indie rock music that spans the adolescent yearning of "Ryan's Basement," the anthemic "Oklahoma," and the punky, alienated "Luxury." Chiming guitars, atmospheric keyboards, and aching vocals sometimes recall Nirvana or, very occasionally, the noise-rock of latter-day Dinosaur Jr.

1. Luxury
2. Oklahoma
3. Holding The Gun
4. Testify Yourself
5. Ryan's Basement
6. Zombies
7. The Water
8. Aesthetics
9. You've Got It All Wrong
10. The Date
11. Hell
12. Bonus Track 1
